name: HATRED (itch) (George Cranton)
description:
This game was made at the very start of November 2020 for Trijam #93: The 3 hour game jam. After leaving it up for about a year, I decided to take this game and 'Heart Attack' down but now I've decided to reupload them both and make their webpages as close to the original as possible.

This game was made for Trijam #93: The 3 hour game jam which had the theme of 'unbeatable'. Because of this, I decided to make a game where you have to avoid incoming enemies for as long as possible.

The one you can play in the browser is what was submitted to the game jam but you can download a updated version which counts points and is a little harder, if you want.

How to Play:

Move the mouse to move the character and avoid all of the orange faces.
